scepter.desc: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack them for 7 seconds. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion.

shard.desc: Increases range by 300 and reduces cooldown by 2.

scepter.desc:
Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants Axe 7 armor per affected target. 

Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown by 3.

shard.desc: Causes Axe's attacks to have a chance to proc a Counter Helix. Attack procs ignore Counter Helix cooldown. Increases attack speed by 35 and proc chance by 10%.

scepter.desc: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by 45 seconds. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions takes 700%% incoming damage and immediately dies if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

shard.desc: Causes Brain Sap to become a 550 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 25%.

scepter.desc: Grants Bloodseeker two charges of Rupture

shard.desc: Bloodrage attacks now deal 2% of the targetâ€™s max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

scepter.desc: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.

shard.desc: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this.

scepter.desc: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

shard.desc: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemy heroes, reducing their regeneration by 10% per stack. Increases damage by 5 per stack. Lasts 7 seconds. If an enemy hero dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal 60 magic damage per stack and 40%% slow for 2 seconds to enemies within 650 radius. Max Stacks: 7

scepter.desc: Enchant Totem becomes a %distance_scepter% range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a 40%% cleave hit.

shard.desc: Reduces Fissure cooldown by 2 seconds and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for half the duration.

scepter.desc: Performs a mini Omnislash for a short duration.

shard.desc: Increases movement speed during Blade Fury by 100 and attacks a random nearby unit once per second dealing 75% damage.

scepter.desc: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies within 500 AoE along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second starfall that deals 50% damage to the impacted unit.

shard.desc: Grants +1 Leap Charge. Leap buff grants Mirana 1.5x Critical Strike attacks for its duration.

scepter.desc: Allows targeting allied heroes. While Morphed, Morphling gains Cast Range increase.

shard.desc: Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and increases the stun duration by 1 second. Multishot prioritizes heroes.

scepter.desc: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

shard.desc: Lowers nearby enemy magic resistance by 14%%.

scepter.desc: Adds Juxtapose active ability. Destroys Phantom Lancer's other juxtapose illusions and quickly creates the max illusions it allows with a bonus 10 seconds of duration.

shard.desc: Spirit Lance bounces once on an enemy within 750 radius, prioritizing heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage by +40%%.

scepter.desc: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

shard.desc: Waning Rift now deals 70 bonus damage and knocks enemies back 250 distance over 0.4 seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for 5 seconds.

scepter.desc:
Increases Rot radius by %scepter_rot_radius_bonus% and damage by %scepter_rot_damage_bonus%.

Reduces health regen on affected enemies by 25%%.

shard.desc: Allows targeting an ally to swallow them and heal them for %scepter_regen_pct%%% of their max health per second. Reduces cooldown by 10 seconds.

scepter.desc: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

shard.desc: Causes Storm Surge to have an 18% chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release forked lightning that strikes the target and up to 2 other enemies. Deals 150 Damage and slows them by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

scepter.desc: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by Sand King's Burrowstrike and increases its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.

shard.desc: Every 700 units moved causes an Epicenter Pulse around Sand King in 475 AoE.

scepter.desc: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

shard.desc: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and allied heroes within 750 AoE of him 3 Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range and transports Sven along the storm hammer.

shard.desc: Storm Hammer now applies a dispel on enemies and reduces cooldown by 4 seconds.

scepter.desc: Tiny channels this ability to throw random trees within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

shard.desc: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

scepter.desc: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes 100%% damage and can cast all of her spells. Illusion has 25%% movement speed bonus. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her.

shard.desc: Wave of Terror steals 20%% of enemy hero base damage and base armor, granting it to Vengeful Spirit for the debuff duration.

scepter.desc: Grants %max_charges% charges to Windrun and grants haste movement speed. Passively provides 30%% Evasion.

shard.desc: Powershot now becomes global, but only hits heroes beyond its default range (max 1 hero). Impacted heroes will be killed if they are under 13% after taking the impact damage. Lowers cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

scepter.desc: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

shard.desc: Static Field can be cast to perform a Heavenly Jump, shocking the closest visible enemy (prioritizing heroes) within 2000 range, dealing Static Field damage to them and reducing their movement speed by 100% for 2.5 seconds. If Zeus was moving forward, he will jump towards that direction. Cooldown: 11. Manacost: 100.

scepter.desc: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around Kunkka once every %torrent_interval% for %torrent_duration% seconds. Spawns within %torrent_max_distance% range of him.

shard.desc: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals %damage% damage and drags enemies along it for %knockback_distance% distance. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

scepter.desc: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

shard.desc: Increases Laguna Blade's cast range by 250 and causes it to go the full cast length and hit all units along the way. Can be ground targeted.

scepter.desc: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

shard.desc: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to three enemies. You become Spell Immune while channeling.

scepter.desc: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.

shard.desc: Shackles creates 4 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 125. Lasts 7 seconds.

scepter.desc: Whenever Slardar casts Slithereen Crush, he creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for movement and bonuses.

shard.desc: Causes Slithereen Crush to apply Corrosive Haze for 5 seconds to units affected. Increases radius by 75.

scepter.desc: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

shard.desc: Increases Anchor Smash damage by 90 and causes it to affect buildings. Reduces cooldown by 1 second.

scepter.desc: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

shard.desc: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward for 2 seconds. Death Ward has -30 Attack Speed. He is hidden during this time.

scepter.desc: Casts Sinister Gaze in a target area.

shard.desc:
Creates an icicle at the target spot for %duration% seconds, slowing enemies within %aura_radius% range by %bonus_movespeed%%%. Has 800 health.

Chain Frost can bounce to the Icicle if there are no other enemies in range.

Can cast Frost Shield on it.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.

shard.desc: Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep for %duration% seconds or if they take 200 damage. At the end of the duration, the target wakes up and takes %damage% damage, and is slowed by %movement_slow%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds.

scepter.desc: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

shard.desc: Black Hole does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.

scepter.desc: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +400 cast range and reducing the enemy hero's size and current health by 15% (stacking). The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

shard.desc: Targets an allied unit, applying a barrier to them that blocks the next %damage_absorb% damage and provides %status_resistance%%% Status Resistance. Barrier lasts up to %barrier_duration% seconds.

scepter.desc: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and disable the enemy target.

shard.desc: Grants Concussive Grenade. Deals 125 damage, knocking enemies back 425 distance, slowing them by 50%% and disarming them for 3 seconds. Radius: 375. Knocks you back 450 units on cast.

scepter.desc: Increases Heartstopper Aura damage while Ghost Shroud is active.

shard.desc: Spawns a fast moving large Death Pulse towards the target enemy or ally, causing the target to become ethereal for 2.5 seconds. Reduces enemy magic resistance by 25%. Spreads towards nearby enemies and allies after impact.

scepter.desc: Calls %number_of_golems_scepter% Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

shard.desc: Turns Shadow Word into a 450 AoE Spell. Grants 10%% movement speed bonus to allies and slows enemies by 10%%.

scepter.desc: Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown and can be used again once they come back. Increases damage by 30.

shard.desc: Reduces Hawk cooldown by 15 seconds. Hawks gains Dive Bomb. Channels for 1 second, revealing itself, and then flies towards the target enemy, dealing 250 damage and stunning them for 2 seconds, killing the hawk. Cast Range: 1200.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

shard.desc: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals 175 damage in a 300 AoE and silences for 1.75 seconds.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

shard.desc: Causes Venomous Gale to summon two Plague Wards when it impacts an enemy hero. Increases travel range by 400.

scepter.desc: Applies a Time Lock proc to all units at the landing destination.

shard.desc: Replaces Time Walk with Reverse Time Walk for 1.5 seconds after landing. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

scepter.desc: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for %scepter_duration% seconds. Buffs the transformed units with +70 attack speed and +25%% movement speed.

shard.desc: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and spawn three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

scepter.desc: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for bonus its usual damage then return to her with life.

shard.desc: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1 and causes enemies to be feared for 2 seconds if they are siphoned for 4 seconds consecutively.

scepter.desc: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Anytime Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her abilities are refreshed. Reduces Blur cooldown and increases Fade Time to 0.75.

shard.desc: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her in a 550 AoE, dealing 16% of a victim's max health on impact and applying break for 3 seconds.

scepter.desc: Removes cooldown and increases damage.

shard.desc: For every 1.5 seconds of channel, another secondary Life Drain is created targeting another random enemy hero.

scepter.desc: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after a brief channel. Does not break meld. Detonates the Psionic Trap on arrival.

shard.desc: Causes Psionic Traps to silence enemies for up to 3.5 seconds based on how long the trap has been charged. Increases max trap count by 4 and vision by 125.

scepter.desc: Decreases mana cost and cooldown. Increases cast range.

shard.desc: Causes Poison Attack to lower armor by 1 per stack and allows it to affect buildings for 40% poison damage. Increases max stacks by 3.

scepter.desc: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

shard.desc: Allows Lucent beam to be ground targeted with a 325 target search radius. Also releases attacks on up to two random targets within 500 range of the Lucent Beam. Reduces mancost by 50.

scepter.desc: Increases the level of Dragon Knight's ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, increased Magic Resistance and free pathing.

shard.desc: Ignites a %radius% AoE area for %duration% seconds, dealing %damage% damage per second to enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

scepter.desc: Causes Shadow Wave to dispel allies. Increases heal by +100 and damage by +100.

shard.desc: Causes Poison Touch to hex affected targets for 1.25 seconds.

scepter.desc: Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.

shard.desc: Rises up, granting Clockwerk flying vision, flying movement, and a %bonus_speed%%% bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Lasts up to %duration% seconds or until he casts Hookshot.

scepter.desc: Causes all nearby enemies in %radius% AoE to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, causing them to take %magic_amp%%% more magic damage and be slowed by %slow%%% for %duration% seconds. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause you to take amplified damage.

shard.desc: Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location three additional times, with a 5 second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by 75. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.

scepter.desc: Lowers cooldown from 85 to 60. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 2 up to 3.8 seconds at max bounce.

shard.desc: Causes the first two trees destroyed with Sprout to summon Greater Treants. Can only have two Greater Treants alive.

scepter.desc: Allows Infesting enemy heroes for 5 seconds, attacking their insides once every 1.25 seconds and doubling Lifestealer's regen rate. Increases cast range to 500 and reduces cooldown to 20 seconds.

shard.desc: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes.

scepter.desc: Causes Ion Shell to have 2 Charges, increases duration by 20 seconds and provides +300 Health.

shard.desc: Grants Normal Punch. Passive cooldown attack. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to knock an illusion out of the victim and stun them for up to 2.25 seconds, 350 distance and 250 damage based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3 seconds. Max power is reached after 900 distance moved. Illusions lasts for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 14

scepter.desc: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.

shard.desc: Causes Skeleton Walk to create two Burning Army Skeletons.

scepter.desc: Increases duration, provides HP regen, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

shard.desc: Causes Omniknight's next attack to deal bonus pure damage based on %bonus_damage% plus %base_damage%%% of his base damage. He is healed for the same amount of pure damage. Cooldown: 4

scepter.desc: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 3 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 200.

shard.desc: Adds 3 permanent Nature's Attendants that follow Enchantress around.

scepter.desc: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.

shard.desc: Causes Inner Fire to reduce healing and regeneration by 50%% and applies a 40%% movement speed slow. Lowers cooldown by 3 seconds. Can be cast while disabled.

scepter.desc: Causes Void to be an AoE ability. Increases the ministun duration.

shard.desc: Night Stalker can cast Hunter in the Night. Consumes a creep, instantly killing it and restoring 35% of Night Stalker's maximum HP and and 25% of maximum mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime. Cooldown: 20

scepter.desc: Increases movement speed, removes movement speed limit, and increases Spin Web max count

shard.desc: Causes Silken Bola to be a 550 AoE spell and increases the miss chance to 80%

scepter.desc: Upgrades Shuriken Toss. Applies Jinada to it, reduces cooldown and increases cast range.

shard.desc: Shadow Walk now grants you 35% damage reduction while invisible. Attacking out of invisibility stuns the target for 1 second. Lowers cooldown by 5 seconds.

scepter.desc: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.

shard.desc: Reduces cooldown by 4 seconds. Causes The Swarm to latch onto and reveal invisible units. Causes Geminate attack to launch on other enemies within 1200 range of the target that have Beetles attached to them.

scepter.desc: Increases Macropyre distance by +400 range, duration by +20 seconds and causes it to become Pure damage and pierce Spell Immunity.

shard.desc: Stuns enemies for %stun_duration% seconds and applies a frost debuff that slows enemy movement speed by %movement_slow%%% and take %base_damage% plus %pct_health_damage%%% of their max health per second as damage for %duration% seconds.

scepter.desc: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within range. The secondary target is tethered to the first.

shard.desc: Causes Flamebreak to have two charges and apply a Sticky Napalm charge on impact.

scepter.desc: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps.

shard.desc: Allows Divine Favor to be cast on allies, teleporting them back home after %teleport_delay% seconds. Cannot target Spell Immune Allies. Cast Range: 600

scepter.desc: Allows Spectre to perform a single target unit Haunt. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.

shard.desc: Can cast Dispersion on a hero that damaged you in the last 8 seconds.  Illusion lasts 5 seconds. Cooldown: 25

scepter.desc: Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by half.

shard.desc: Causes Ice Vortex to deal 40 DPS and reduces attack speed by 20.

scepter.desc: Doom applies Break and increases duration by 6 seconds.

shard.desc: Infernal Blade stun duration is increased from 0.6 to 1.2 seconds. If the enemy's level is a multiple of 3, or above level 24, they will be stunned for an additional 0.6 seconds and take 150 bonus damage.

scepter.desc: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

shard.desc: Causes Earthshock to apply a 1.5 second Enrage buff on yourself. Reduces cooldown by 1 seconds.

scepter.desc: Increases Charge of Darkness movement speed and reduces cooldown.

shard.desc: Causes Nether Strike to deal 200 extra damage, and apply a 4-second break. Grants you Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.

scepter.desc: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.

shard.desc: Rocket Barrage hits an extra target and increases duration by 1 second.

scepter.desc: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.

shard.desc:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them %attack_speed% Attack Speed and %hp_regen% HP regen.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

scepter.desc: Creates a Cataclysm when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a 90 second cooldown. Creates 2 visible Sun Strikes within 160-200 range of each enemy hero.

shard.desc: Causes two extra Chaos Meteors to land alongisde the primary cast at slight angles. Reduces cooldown by 15 seconds.

scepter.desc: Causes Last Word to become an AoE ability.

shard.desc: Causes Glaives to bounce once towards the closest enemy unit, dealing 50%% of Silencer's attack damage. Bounce range is 600.

scepter.desc: Grants charges to Astral Imprisonment, increases damage by 140 and applies the damage in an area.

shard.desc: Essence Flux becomes castable ability with 0.75 cast time. Swaps Outworld Destroyer's current Life and Mana totals. Cooldown: 45

scepter.desc: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain %lifesteal_percent%%% Lifesteal and share %lifesteal%%% Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within %lifesteal_range% range of each other.

shard.desc: Causes one of your creep waves to include one uncontrollable wolf that moves with the wave.

scepter.desc: Primal Split has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time. Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.

shard.desc: Primal Split now creates a Void brewling. Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in 500 AoE. Applies a 20/30/40% slow and Disarm for 2 seconds.

scepter.desc: Cooldown is removed, replaced with %max_charges% charges that replenish every %charge_restore_time_tooltip_scepter% seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.

shard.desc: Allows Demonic Purge to be cast on allies, continuously dispelling them and healing for its damage values. Does not slow allies.

scepter.desc: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

shard.desc: Savage Roar now empowers allies in 700 AoE with +20% Movement Speed and +60 Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Applies a basic dispel. Replicates between Lone Druid and Spirit Bear regardless of castability on the other.

scepter.desc: Creates an illusion of allied heroes. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.

shard.desc: Chaos Bolt creates a Phantasm illusion attacking the target for 6 seconds. Increases cast range by 300.

scepter.desc: Channels for 0.75 seconds and digs into the ground for 3.5 seconds, dispelling Meepo and causing him to be come invulnerable and untargetable for %duration%. Restores %hp_restore%%% of his max health over that duration. Canâ€™t be cast while rooted.

shard.desc: Allows you to Poof to allies within 2000 range.

scepter.desc: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.

shard.desc: Causes you to become invisible with Nature's Guise and root enemies upon attacking. Roots them for 1 second and deals a total of 200 damage. Lasts an extra second when attacking near a tree. Increases movement speed bonus by 15%%%.

scepter.desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is %scepter_mana%%% of Ogre Magi's current mana.

shard.desc:
Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing 85%% of the damage of next %attacks% attacks. Launches fireballs at the attacker, dealing %damage% damage.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

scepter.desc: Increases strength steal.

shard.desc: Increases Decay radius by 100 and spawns a zombie around each hero target.

scepter.desc: Decreases cooldown, increases cast range and upgrades the spell to the Scepter level.

shard.desc: Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is 85% longer and cooldown is reduced by 30%% when targeting allies. Throw delay reduced to 0.5 seconds.

scepter.desc: Mutes items.

shard.desc: Allows Thunder Strike to be cast on allies, follows the ally and deals damage around them. Each strike gives a short 1.25 second buff that provides +50%% Movement Speed and +75 Attack Speed. Increases radius to 650.

scepter.desc: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.

shard.desc: Causes Nyx's Vendetta attack to reduce enemy magic resistance by 20%% for 4 seconds. Also increases Vendetta movement speed by 25%, unlocking max speed.

scepter.desc: Allows Ensnare to target Spell Immune or sleeping units. Reduces the Ensnare cooldown by 6 seconds and increases cast range by 400.

shard.desc: Adds 20% slow and increases the base armor reduction by 4.

scepter.desc: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.

shard.desc: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

scepter.desc: Spirits now passively spawn around Io constantly every second. Max of 5.

shard.desc: Tether stuns enemies touching it for 1.75 seconds and deals 150 damage. Does not affect the same unit more than once every 7 seconds. Increases movement speed bonus by 10%%.

scepter.desc: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage 20%% movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal %bonus_damage%%% more damage for %bonus_duration% seconds. Lasts %invis_duration% seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.

shard.desc: Grants Visage the ability to cast Stone Form. Restores up to 35% of your health. Cooldown: 60. Manacost: 125.

scepter.desc: Provides %max_charges% charges and increases pounce range.

shard.desc: Creates a 300 AoE cloud at the target location for %duration% seconds. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance. Cast Range: 800. Cooldown: 75

scepter.desc: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.

shard.desc: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy. Cooldown: 12.

scepter.desc: Causes Melee Axes to dispel Troll Warlord. Reduces cooldown and manacost.

shard.desc: Global active. Grants all allied heroes %attack_speed% Attack Speed or %status_resistance%%% Status Resistance for %duration% seconds based on whichever stance Troll is currently in. Ranged provides attack speed and melee provides status resistance.

scepter.desc: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs. Increases duration by 1 second.

shard.desc: Causes Double Edge to increase Centaur's strength by 15%% per hero hit for 15 seconds. Duration refreshes per stack. Max 5 Stacks. Slows enemies by 25%% for 2 seconds.

scepter.desc: Magnus releases 3 Shockwaves traveling away from him at 30-degree angles. After reaching their limit, the Shockwaves return to their origin, dealing 75%% damage and pulling a second time.

shard.desc: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies spend %air_duration% seconds in the air, then take %damage% damage and are stunned for %stun_duration% seconds upon landing.

scepter.desc: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.

shard.desc: Releases a %width% width flame that extends %length% range in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals %damage_per_second% damage per second and slows by 30%%. Affects buildings for 40%% damage. Lasts %duration% seconds. Debuff lingers for 3 seconds.

scepter.desc: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. Increases Stack Limit to %stack_limit_scepter%.

shard.desc: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in a 700 radius with Goo and 2 Quills.

scepter.desc: Kicks the closest enemy unit in a targeted direction, stunning and damaging them.

shard.desc: Summons a flying Sigil that slows movement speed by -40% for enemies within 650 radius. Lasts 25 seconds. Cooldown: 30

scepter.desc: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within %scepter_radius% range. Heroes will take priority

Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than %ally_threshold_scepter% damage while within %redirect_range_scepter% range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.

shard.desc: Causes Mist Coil and Aphotic Shield to apply a Curse of Avernus stack on enemies. Increase base slow by 10%%. Lowers Cooldown for Mist Coil and Aphotic Shield by 1 second.

scepter.desc: Causes you to become Spell Immune for %scepter_magic_immune_per_hero% seconds per affected enemy hero when the spirit returns to you.

shard.desc: Allows you to switch Echo Stomp to autocast. When cast while on autocast, Elder Titan will take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

scepter.desc: Increases Duel duration, and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take 50% damage from other sources. Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds.

shard.desc: Press The Attack targets now gain Spell Immunity for 1.75 seconds. Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds.

scepter.desc: Increases damage and cast range.

shard.desc: Increases Blast Off! cast range by 300 and applies a 1.75 second stun to affected enemies.

scepter.desc: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges. Activate Fire Remnant costs less mana.

shard.desc: Fire Remnants deal 45 damage per second in a 600 AoE around them. If an enemy hero dies within 400 range of Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

scepter.desc:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies.

Can be cast on Earth Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.

shard.desc: Causes Stone Remnant to provide 375 ground vision. Increases charge count by 4.

scepter.desc: Dark Rift has two charges and can be cast on allied heroes. Reduces cast delay by 1 second.

shard.desc: Firestorm can be self-targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows Underlord around. Increases the wave count by 3. Reduces cast point by half.

scepter.desc: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become feared upon impact, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for %scepter_meta_duration% seconds.

shard.desc: Costs %health_cost_pct%%% of Terrorblade's Current HP to cast, providing him +%berserk_bonus_movement_speed% Movement and +%berserk_bonus_attack_speed% Attack Speed for %duration% seconds. Provides %melee_bonus%%% more bonus while melee. Cooldown: 14.

scepter.desc: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

shard.desc: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova. Slows enemies by 12%.

scepter.desc: Fate's Edict no longer causes allies to be disarmed or enemies to be immune to magic damage.

shard.desc: Causes False Promise to have a 0.15-second fade delay invisibility.

scepter.desc: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.

shard.desc: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200 range. Reduces cooldown by 5 seconds.

scepter.desc: Causes Spark Wraiths to spawn a new Spark Wraith after impacting an enemy, which then starts its 3 second activation period.

shard.desc: Magnetic Field now pushes enemies out of the area at cast time, and provides allies in it with +40% Magic Resistance. Slows enemies inside by 20%.

scepter.desc: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby.

shard.desc: Reduces cooldown to 0.4 and cast point to 0.1.

scepter.desc: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.

shard.desc: Cursed Crown creates four brambles around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces cooldown by 3 seconds and stun delay by 1 second.

scepter.desc: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle in every 90 degrees around your hero.

shard.desc: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball for up to 4 seconds, gaining magic immunity and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker for 0.75 seconds, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way. Cooldown: 30

scepter.desc: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is spell immune, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.

shard.desc: Causes Ink Swell to deal 40% more damage and heal the target for 40% of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispell.

scepter.desc: Tosses a boomerang at the target enemy in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a Hunter's Mark that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage and have reduced status resistance.

shard.desc: Hoodwink sends a decoy illusion to the target location.  When the illusion is attacked or hit by a targeted ability, it is destroyed and plants a tree in its place that applies a lesser Bushwhack to enemy heroes around it.

scepter.desc: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain two charges.

shard.desc: Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by %shard_bonus_damage%.

scepter.desc: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit that slows and applies damage over time.

shard.desc: Causes Scatterblast to knock units back in the point blank range for 250 units, dealing 125 extra damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

scepter.desc: Creates invulnerable soldiers around Mars' front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his full damage +75 and applying procs. Attacks slow enemies by 30% for 1 second. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.

shard.desc: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind for 10 seconds. Deals 35 damage per second and slows by 20%%. Debuff lingers for 2 seconds.
